attributes.action: Make motorcycle awareness part of the theory test
attributes.additional_details: Maybe this petition will never reach parliament but just by signing and sharing maybe we could reach out and make bikers more aware to drivers.
attributes.background: Being a biker I see daily too many people using phones, vapes, headphones etc while driving, Cars pulling out on bikes and tail gating, Just recently a motorcycle rider was killed local to me because a car pulled out on him and he couldnt stop in time, More needs to be done to help bikers be seen.
